mapper.select: SELECT productCode,productName,cityCode,cityName, SUM(IFNULL(receivableCount,0)) as receivableCount,SUM(IFNULL(receivableAmount,0)) as receivableAmount,SUM(IFNULL(overdueCount,0)) as overdueCount,SUM(IFNULL(overdueAmount,0)) as overdueAmount, SUM(IFNULL(lendingCount,0)) as lendingCount,SUM(IFNULL(lendingAmount,0)) as lendingAmount,SUM(IFNULL(notLendingAmount,0)) as notLendingAmount,SUM(IFNULL(notLendingCount,0)) as notLendingCount, SUM(IFNULL(notLendingAmount,0)) as notLendingAmount,SUM(IFNULL(notLendingCount,0)) as notLendingCount,SUM(IFNULL(notReceivableAmount,0)) as notReceivableAmount,SUM(IFNULL(notReceivableCount,0))as notReceivableCount, SUM(IFNULL(notOverdueCount,0))as notOverdueCount,SUM(IFNULL(notOverdueAmount,0))as notOverdueAmount,SUM(IFNULL(notReceivableSum,0)) as notReceivableSum,SUM(IFNULL(notReceivableAmountSum,0))as notReceivableAmountSum, SUM(IFNULL(overdueAmountRatio,0))as overdueAmountRatio,SUM(IFNULL(overdueAmountRatioByCount,0))as overdueAmountRatioByCount,SUM(IFNULL(overdueAmountRatioBySum,0))as overdueAmountRatioBySum,SUM(IFNULL(overdueNumber,0)) as overdueNumber, SUM(IFNULL(overdueDay,0)) as overdueDay,SUM(IFNULL(overdueBigDay,0)) as overdueBigDay,SUM(IFNULL(overDayCount,0)) as overDayCount from tbl_order_receivable_report where productCode != "04" and cityCode =#{cityCode} and productCode = #{productCode} GROUP BY cityCode ORDER BY createTime asc
